aboutRight.aboutText: Born in 2000, living in Morocco. We provide on-screen design for websites and apps, as well as front-end implementation. We will continue to pursue a wide range of expressions and better code by pursuing our ‚Äúlikes‚Äù.

archivement.text: Hello there! My name is Reda Belourhzal. I am a web developer, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.

aboutRight.note: ‚ÄúWeb developer passionate about creating user-friendly websites with clean code. Let's build something great together! üë©‚ÄçüíªüöÄ‚Äù

experienceData.text: Hello there! My name is REDA BELOURHZAL. I am a web developer, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.

serviceData.title: Web Developement
serviceData.heading: Perspiciatis vero deleniti dolor assumenda voluptatum animi
serviceData.text: Passionate about Web Development, I strive to create exceptional user experiences through clean and efficient code. I'm dedicated to building elegant and user-friendly websites. Let's work together to make the web better! üë©‚ÄçüíªüöÄ

contactInfo.title: Chat to us
contactInfo.text: Our freandly team is there to help.

contactForm.title: Got Ideas? We have got the skills. Lets team up.
contactForm.text: Tell us more about yourself and what you are got in mind.
